channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Scoop: Trump plans to appoint U.S. general to lead Gaza security force
item.description: The Trump administration is planning to appoint an American two-star general to command the International Stabilization Force (ISF) in Gaza, according...

item.title: JPMorgan: The biggest national security threat may be America's workforce
item.description: America has a talent shortage, with 40% of adults lacking basic digital skills, says a new report from JPMorganChase that bolsters the bank's recently...

item.title: Wall Street prepares for a $3 trillion IPO gusher

item.title: Influencer feuds trigger total MAGA meltdown

item.title: Inside Kristi Noem's bitter feud with Trump's border czar
item.description: The acrimony is so deep between President Trump 's border czar and his homeland security secretary that the two officials barely speak to or meet with...

item.title: Republicans struggle to unite on health care as Obamacare subsidies expire
item.description: Recent weeks have showcased a free-for-all of competing GOP ideas and reinforced deep partisan divisions over the issue.

item.title: How a U.S. admiral decided to kill two boat strike survivors
item.description: The controversial order given by Adm. Frank Bradley is under scrutiny from Congress. Inside the most consequential deliberation of his career.

item.title: Meet the Trump administration’s 12 billionaires
item.description: At a net worth of $390 billion, it’s the wealthiest White House in modern history.

item.title: Billionaires are spending massive sums on politics. A backlash brews.
item.description: An anti-oligarch protest in a small Indiana town shows the depth of the national backlash against the concentration of wealth and power.

item.title: Why these red state Republicans are resisting Trump’s efforts to expand GOP power
item.description: Republicans hold a 40-10 advantage in the state senate but may still reject Trump’s pressure. ‘Hoosiers are very independent.’

item.title: Trump will again test ‘blame Democrats’ message on the economy — this time at a casino

item.title: White House bullish on economic growth as Thanksgiving spending rises
item.description: Economic adviser Kevin Hassett dismissed economic bedwetters, saying strong spending bodes well for the economy.

item.title: Trump, stung by Republican losses, stands his ground on affordability

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
